segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s really stretching, and that stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall—it would be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for him to hand her a cookie, looking so eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how focused she is on that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to laugh, but it’s too dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR
